*   [vlc-mcp-server (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/piebro/vlc-mcp-server) -  An MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server to play and control movies using the VLC HTTP API and natural language using an LLM.

items.title: Awesome Vlc Updates on Nov 15 - Nov 21, 2021
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Nov 15 - Nov 21, 2021
items.content_text:
### VLC web & lua extensions

*   [VideoLAN addons website](https://addons.videolan.org/browse/) - VideoLAN addons website.
*   [vlc-delete (‚≠ê99)](https://github.com/surrim/vlc-delete) - VLC extension to remove videos from the hard disk.
*   [TraktForVLC (‚≠ê310)](https://github.com/XaF/TraktForVLC) - Automatically trakt.tv what you're watching on VLC.
*   [playlist-youtube-vlc (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/Abstraxt-AA/playlist-youtube-vlc) - Lua plugin to parse Youtube playlists.
*   [vlc-super-skipper (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/Trevelopment/vlc-super-skipper) - Automatically Skip Opening and Ending Sequences.
items.content_html:
VLC web & lua extensions

  • VideoLAN addons website - VideoLAN addons website.
  • vlc-delete (‚≠ê99) - VLC extension to remove videos from the hard disk.
  • TraktForVLC (‚≠ê310) - Automatically trakt.tv what you're watching on VLC.
  • playlist-youtube-vlc (‚≠ê7) - Lua plugin to parse Youtube playlists.
  • vlc-super-skipper (‚≠ê14) - Automatically Skip Opening and Ending Sequences.

items.title: Awesome Vlc Updates on Jun 28 - Jul 04, 2021
items.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Jun 28 - Jul 04, 2021
items.content_text:
### Tutorials

*   [HLS Record tutorial](https://mfkl.github.io/hls/2018/10/10/How-to-record-HLS-stream-with-LibVLCSharp-and-.NET-Core.html) - How to record an HLS stream with LibVLCSharp and .NET Core.
*   [RTSP mosaic tutorial](https://mfkl.github.io/libvlc/rtsp/xamarin/forms/2018/12/05/crossplatform-RTSP-mosaic-views-with-libvlcsharp.html) - Cross-platform RTSP Mosaic views with LibVLCSharp.
*   [MediaElement tutorial](https://doumer.me/vlc-media-player-in-xamarinforms-alternative-avplayer-andmediaplayer) - VLC Media Player control in Xamarin Forms.

### Community

*   [Stack Overflow - LibVLC](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/libvlc) - LibVLC on Stack Overflow.
*   [Stack Overflow - VLC](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/vlc) - VLC on Stack Overflow.
*   [Mailing Lists](https://www.videolan.org/support/lists.html) - VideoLAN developer mailing lists.
*   [IRC](https://wiki.videolan.org/Contact_VideoLAN/#IRC) - The VideoLAN IRC information.
*   [Forum](https://forum.videolan.org/) - The official VideoLAN forum.
*   [LibVLC Discord](https://discord.gg/3h3K3JF) - The official LibVLC Community Discord Server.
*   [Twitter](https://twitter.com/videolan) - The official VideoLAN Twitter account.
*   [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/vlc) - Unofficial VLC community on Reddit.
items.content_html:
Tutorials

  • HLS Record tutorial - How to record an HLS stream with LibVLCSharp and .NET Core.
  • RTSP mosaic tutorial - Cross-platform RTSP Mosaic views with LibVLCSharp.
  • MediaElement tutorial - VLC Media Player control in Xamarin Forms.

Community

  • Stack Overflow - LibVLC - LibVLC on Stack Overflow.
  • Stack Overflow - VLC - VLC on Stack Overflow.
  • Mailing Lists - VideoLAN developer mailing lists.
  • IRC - The VideoLAN IRC information.
  • Forum - The official VideoLAN forum.
  • LibVLC Discord - The official LibVLC Community Discord Server.
  • Twitter - The official VideoLAN Twitter account.
  • Reddit - Unofficial VLC community on Reddit.

items.title: Awesome Vlc Updates on May 10 - May 16, 2021
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on May 10 - May 16, 2021
items.content_text:
### Docs

*   [Code & Bug tracker](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/vlc/-/issues) - Recently moved from Trac, contains a lot of valuable info on bugs and feature requests.

### VLC native plugins

*   [vlc-plugin-marker (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/nemosharma6/vlc-plugin-marker) - The marker plugin provides you the ability to mark important sections of a video. These sections can be viewed later without the need to search for it in the entire video.

### Bindings

*   [VLCKit](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/VLCKit) - The libvlc bindings for macOS, iOS, iPadOS and tvOS in Objective-C.
*   [libvlcjni](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/vlc-android/-/tree/master/libvlc) - The libvlc bindings for the Android platform.
*   [flutter\_vlc\_player (‚≠ê571)](https://github.com/solid-software/flutter_vlc_player) - Flutter bindings to LibVLC.
items.content_html:
Docs

  • Code & Bug tracker - Recently moved from Trac, contains a lot of valuable info on bugs and feature requests.

VLC native plugins

  • vlc-plugin-marker (‚≠ê10) - The marker plugin provides you the ability to mark important sections of a video. These sections can be viewed later without the need to search for it in the entire video.

Bindings

  • VLCKit - The libvlc bindings for macOS, iOS, iPadOS and tvOS in Objective-C.
  • libvlcjni - The libvlc bindings for the Android platform.
  • flutter_vlc_player (‚≠ê571) - Flutter bindings to LibVLC.

items.title: Awesome Vlc Updates on Apr 05 - Apr 11, 2021
items.summary: 19 awesome projects updated on Apr 05 - Apr 11, 2021
items.content_text:
### Docs

*   [videolan.org](https://www.videolan.org/) - Where it all starts.
*   [LibVLC API docs](https://videolan.videolan.me/vlc/group__libvlc.html) - Docs for LibVLC's engine. C APIs.
*   [Wiki](https://wiki.videolan.org/) - Lots of great info on here.
*   [CLI flags](https://wiki.videolan.org/VLC_command-line_help) - A comprehensive list of all VLC commandline flags. Really useful for searching random flags that you come across in the wild.

### VLC native plugins

*   [vlc-pause-click-plugin (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/nurupo/vlc-pause-click-plugin) - Plugin for VLC that pauses/plays video on mouse click.
*   [vlc-tip-plugin (‚≠ê59)](https://github.com/aklexel/vlc-tip-plugin) - TIP (translate it, please) is a plugin for VLC media player that helps you to study languages by watching videos.
*   [vlc-bittorrent (‚≠ê443)](https://github.com/johang/vlc-bittorrent) - A bittorrent plugin for VLC.

### Apps

*   [VLC desktop](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/vlc) - The original Desktop app running on Linux/Windows (Qt) and macOS (Cocoa).
*   [VLC iOS](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/vlc-ios) - VLC for iOS is the official port of VLC on the iOS/tvOS platforms.
*   [VLC Android](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/vlc-android) - VLC for Android, Android TV and ChromeOS.
*   [VLC Benchmark (Beta)](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/vlc-bench) - Video decoding and rendering benchmark tool, based on VLC.

### Bindings

*   [vlc-unity](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/vlc-unity) - Unity3D integration for VLC.
*   [python-vlc (‚≠ê417)](https://github.com/oaubert/python-vlc) - Python vlc bindings.
*   [vlcj (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/caprica/vlcj) -  Java framework for the vlc media player (desktop).
*   [LibVLCSharp (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/videolan/libvlcsharp) - Cross-platform .NET/Mono bindings for LibVLC.
*   [libvlc-go (‚≠ê472)](https://github.com/adrg/libvlc-go) - Go bindings for libVLC and high-level media player interface.
*   [libvlcpp](https://code.videolan.org/videolan/libvlcpp/) - C++ bindings for libvlc.
*   [vlc.js (beta)](https://code.videolan.org/jbk/vlc.js) - WebAssembly support for LibVLC.
*   [dart\_vlc (‚≠ê524)](https://github.com/alexmercerind/dart_vlc) - Dart bindings for libvlc.
items.content_html:
Docs

  • videolan.org - Where it all starts.
  • LibVLC API docs - Docs for LibVLC's engine. C APIs.
  • Wiki - Lots of great info on here.
  • CLI flags - A comprehensive list of all VLC commandline flags. Really useful for searching random flags that you come across in the wild.

VLC native plugins

  • vlc-pause-click-plugin (‚≠ê1k) - Plugin for VLC that pauses/plays video on mouse click.
  • vlc-tip-plugin (‚≠ê59) - TIP (translate it, please) is a plugin for VLC media player that helps you to study languages by watching videos.
  • vlc-bittorrent (‚≠ê443) - A bittorrent plugin for VLC.

Apps

  • VLC desktop - The original Desktop app running on Linux/Windows (Qt) and macOS (Cocoa).
  • VLC iOS - VLC for iOS is the official port of VLC on the iOS/tvOS platforms.
  • VLC Android - VLC for Android, Android TV and ChromeOS.
  • VLC Benchmark (Beta) - Video decoding and rendering benchmark tool, based on VLC.

Bindings

  • vlc-unity - Unity3D integration for VLC.
  • python-vlc (‚≠ê417) - Python vlc bindings.
  • vlcj (‚≠ê1.2k) - Java framework for the vlc media player (desktop).
  • LibVLCSharp (‚≠ê1.6k) - Cross-platform .NET/Mono bindings for LibVLC.
  • libvlc-go (‚≠ê472) - Go bindings for libVLC and high-level media player interface.
  • libvlcpp - C++ bindings for libvlc.
  • vlc.js (beta) - WebAssembly support for LibVLC.
  • dart_vlc (‚≠ê524) - Dart bindings for libvlc.
